attributes.action: Upgrade A120 Harwich to A12 to Dual Carridgeway
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Due to the Severe accident rate, increased use by heavy goods vehicles, and new build homes in the area, The Govenment must give this stretch of the A120 the main route in and out of the busy container port and International Port Terminal, the very highest priority.  Due to the increase in use by HGV's this stretch of the A120 has now recorded 3 deaths in 12 months.
